data.title: Theresa Russell
data.text:
AKA Theresa Paup

Born: 20-Mar-1957

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Insignificance, Black Widow

Son: Statten

Son: Max

Shoplifting
